subject: For the kde people
body:
a post in debian-administration about debian etch:

http://www.debian-administration.org/articles/514#comment_21

quote "Good work guys, I'm going back to Debian..."

if you read the post ... not only kde team has done a great job, but the
entire group of developers.

This was a nice work :)


--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
